                                                                                int x,
                                                                                int y)
                                                                         throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                                                                java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Registers a component
        Parameters:
        componentTemplate - the component
        x - the X coordinate
        y - the Y coordinate
        Returns:
        a CompletableFuture of Void
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the component does not annotate Component
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the frame does not have room for thec component (width, height)
